entry.title: WIND WARNING, Qualicum Beach

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 25 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
